citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:24 AM on 1
APRIL 2022. The inspector arrived at the facility at 10:24 AM and called the farm manager. No responsible adult was
available for an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:24 AM on 1 
APRIL 2022. The inspector arrived at the facility at 10:24 AM and called the farm manager. No responsible adult was 
available for an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
